name: BusinessEdge Solutions
overview: BusinessEdge Solutions provides business and technology consulting services. It offers broadband, Internet protocol, business strategy, network, media, interactive advertising, and wireless solutions for communications, media, and content industries, including cable, wireless, wireline, and media markets. The company also provides investment management excellence, enterprise compliance, client centricity, outcomes management, trading, enterprise contracts management, and product launch solutions for financial services industry, which include asset management, wealth management, capital markets, baking, and insurance markets. In addition, it offers product development acceleration, rapid commercialization, relationship management, customer centricity, operations and supply chain excellence, contracts lifecycle management, value-based compliance, and integrated commercial solutions for life sciences industry, such as pharmaceuticals, biotech, device, diagnostics, and consumer markets. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in East Brunswick, New Jersey.
